templates.title: RACE Framework Marketing Strategist
templates.description: Complete marketing strategy development using RACE (Reach, Act, Convert, Engage) framework
templates.template_content:
Develop a comprehensive marketing strategy using the RACE framework for {{product_service}} targeting {{target_audience}}.

Reach: How will we reach potential customers through {{channels}} with messaging focused on {{value_proposition}}?
Act: What actions do we want them to take regarding {{desired_actions}} and how will we facilitate this through {{activation_tactics}}?
Convert: How will we convert engaged users into customers using {{conversion_strategies}} with optimization for {{conversion_metrics}}?
Engage: How will we maintain ongoing engagement through {{retention_tactics}} and build {{customer_relationships}}?

Budget: {{marketing_budget}} Timeline: {{campaign_timeline}}

fields.label: Product/Service Type
fields.help_text: The type of product or service being marketed

fields.label: Target Audience
fields.help_text: The primary demographic or market segment
